title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 71.6 - Answer to petition; time for answer; service and filing of answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 71.6 - Answer to petition; time for answer; service and filing of answer

State Regulations
(a) The

Commissioner of Labor shall, within 30 days after receipt of the petition, file
with the board an answer or move with respect to the petition. (b) The Commissioner of Labor shall serve by
mail, or by any other method permitted by the Board including but not limited
to electronically, one copy of the answer upon each Petitioner, or the attorney
or authorized representative of record, and shall file the original with the

Board with proof of such service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
71.6

Amended

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
